name: DVD Simulator
description:
My attempt at remaking the classic bouncing DVD logo in Game Maker Studio 1.4.9999.

Made by CST1229

Features:
Bouncing DVD logo
Colors
Left Click Restart
ANDROID SUPPORT (Sorry Macers, i don't have an Apple device)
Adapts to screen size (as long as you restart by clicking)
Adjustable scale and full screen start (see dvd.ini)
Jumpscares if you fullscreen a small window after adapting
Earrape if the window is smaller than the logo

Source included!
